website_summaries.verdict: The creators of the popular Hatchimals interactive toys have released this realistic and responsive doll in time for Christmas. Expensive, but definitely maintains a child's interest and will learn new skills over time.
pros: Advanced interactive technology allows doll to "grow and learn."
Can interact with other Luvabella dolls
cons: Doll's realism may be "too realistic" to some users

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work. She will turn on and right off. Tried 3 sets of brand new batteries. I have been dealing with Spinmaster for over a week about getting a replacement and they keep giving me the run around about sending them a video of the problem? A video of her doing nothing. It's just been a back and forth and my daughter hasn't been able to use this doll she spent her Christmas money on. Don't waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this doll, for about 2 days. She worked great. Then her mouth failed and she started making a loud clicking noise. This is definitely not a doll suitable for young children. We ordered another one. Hopefully the next one will work properly. This will be the third Luvabella we have purchased. The first one was used and the eyes failed. SpinMaster really needs to up their game. Their quality control sucks. If this next doll is defective, SpinMaster will be contacted and given an earful.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Kieff

customer_reviews.title: Great doll, I thought...
customer_reviews.text: At first, I and my 6 yr old were in love with this doll. She was so real! She required attention and constantly was babbling like a real baby. But after 2 weeks her batteries went dead so I replaced them. Well, a few days went by and the baby was always falling asleep which was an indication that the batteries were getting low. So I replaced them again and the same thing happened. My daughter has now lost interest in her and I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: tiffanycanshop

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the doll my daughter will not stop playing it.
customer_reviews.author: Lush

customer_reviews.title: Fun for little girls
customer_reviews.text: Santa brought this baby to our daughter and I was a little worried after reading some of the reviews that she is “creepy”. So far she has just been fun. I love playing with her myself just to see what she is going to do/say next. We really like her!
customer_reviews.author: Brad Nelms

customer_reviews.title: Also the material of the face makes it easy for lint to stick to it
customer_reviews.text: The doll is very heavy. Also the material of the face makes it easy for lint to stick to it. The robotics are nice but noisey. Otherwise a good doll
customer_reviews.author: Ashley-Marie

customer_reviews.title: My little one is 5 and she love this doll
customer_reviews.text: My little one is 5 and she love this doll. She can not keep her hands off of it. Santa bought it for her and still playing with it . My husband and I both were amazed with its real life facial expressions and sounds. Its a must have for your little one....
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughters LOVE this doll. Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: Great doll for baby dolll lovers. It does so much & is very cute. Purchased 3 of these for our granddaughters ages 6, 8, & 11 years old. They absolutely LOVE their new dolls!
customer_reviews.author: GracieGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great interactive doll
customer_reviews.text: Expensive doll, especially when you have to buy two. I gave as birthday gifts for my 8 year old twin granddaughters. I was glad to see it was a better price here on Amazon. My granddaughters saw it at Walmart and it was $100 . So thank you Amazon for about a $50 savings, since I had to buy two. The only thing I wish is that it had a charger that could be plug in. Replacing c-cell batteries is going to be an issue, because they don’t last very long. That’s why I gave 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Purple Passion

customer_reviews.title: Very Loud Motor Sound!!
customer_reviews.text: This doll is keeping my 5yo very entertained and she is having fun with her new toy but we all are very annoyed with the motor sound that is as loud as the baby doll coos. Every movement has a motor sounds from the animatronics inside. Did I mention how loud it is?! Haha!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Paint comes off
customer_reviews.text: This doll has been great. No mechanical issues and my daughter loves her. The reason I did not provide 5 stars is because the hair paint has rubbed off in certain spots. My daughter could care less but as the one who purchased this, a high dollar doll like this should have better quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Luvabella Spoon
customer_reviews.text: I tried to contact customer service to buy a replacement spoon and was told they do not sell replacement parts or accessories for the doll. They designed the doll to only interact with the accessories that comes with it, so you can’t just use a regular spoon. Also, the doll’s gears are noisy when it moves. Update: SpinMaster contacted me and apologized. They sent me a new spoon.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product at all
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it but after a week the dolls hair color is coming off so now she looks bald and she talks but says the same word over n over and doesn’t stop at all I spent over $60 on this and it’s so not worth it at all I’m sorry but I do not recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Johnna Matias

customer_reviews.title: A little creepy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter asked for this for her birthday. We went back and forth based on the price and decided to get it for her. She hasn’t looked at it since her birthday. She said it’s creepy and I agree...
customer_reviews.author: Megh C

customer_reviews.title: Cute but expensive and battery heavy
customer_reviews.text: It is cute doll but doesn’t seem to learn any new words rather just keep blabbering few preprogrammed words. Also it is very battery heavy toy and Duracell 4 big batteries last only for month or two with less than 1 hr play daily. Also weight of toy is higher than expected but it is really alive in expressions
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: Not Entirely Life-Like
customer_reviews.text: My daughter begged for this but inwasn't completely sold on it when I bought it. I think the concept of having a real-life doll is great, but it isn't as exciting as it is described as. The skin is really thick and not lifelike and the hair has a weird texture. If we are investing in a "life-like" doll that cries and her eyes open I wish they would have made her other features more fitting as well especially for the money we paid for the doll.
customer_reviews.author: A M

customer_reviews.title: Interactive but not for my kiddo.
customer_reviews.text: The doll is hard with an odd texture. I find it strange but my six year old hasn’t mentioned it. My daughter was not in love w this doll. She played with it a bit and then put her aside. She says she’s too heavy to have fun with. The doll is amazingly interactive and I thought it would be used constantly but she’s stashed in the corner.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Questionable!! Used??? Dirty!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sooo disappointed! Heart crushed! I bought this doll for my daughter for Christmas. I was beyond excited. I received the packed the doll box was destroyed and the doll it’s self had a very dusty face AND there looks to be something spilled on the face. Not sure if this is used, refurbished or what but it is definitely NOT new. This has literally crushed my Christmas spirit..... I should have known better- not all discounts are legit.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do what its suppose to do
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have never bought this product. My granddaughter could never get the doll to do what the video shows that it is suppose to do. She played with it a couple of times and gave up. The doll has been sitting on her shelf ever since last January. We bought it in December, I should have returned it, but I let time slip away.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda deVries

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: She is cute and all but I have use to much batteries...it eats batteries. Tbe batteries once or twice when you put the doll, not worth buying. I have tried every battery out there if they 20 minutes your lucky its to bad cause the is very cute
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Galipeau

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a few months.....
customer_reviews.text: Well it was fine until the eyes got stuck blinking. And now don’t ever open. Because of that her interactions have been limited and. She either only sleeps or only cries. Pretty annoyed by this.
customer_reviews.author: Lori E.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: This doll is really sweet, my granddaughter loves her and takes her everywhere. The doll can do some really cute things like play peek a boo and chew her food. She is really lifelike. Much heavier than I had thought but my granddaughter doesn't seem to mind that.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Batteries needed. Chuckie like. Mind of her own.
customer_reviews.text: Uses quite a bit of batteries. She will talk on her own when no one is manipulating her. Kinda weird. Jokingly I asked someone to take her and she reached her arms up for them to pick her up. All we could do is love but she’s chuckieISH.
customer_reviews.author: Yes we can

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift but after a while the fun seems to wear off
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas. It was a big hit at first but now she plays with it but not as often. It’s a nice baby doll and if you work with it you can make it talk
customer_reviews.author: Beth Chestnut

customer_reviews.title: Not great at all
customer_reviews.text: Done Christmas early at our house, first thing out of the box this doll is glitching and popping really loud. Not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: candace

customer_reviews.title: It's fun, but motors are super loud
customer_reviews.text: DAughter loves it. It's fun, but motors are super loud
customer_reviews.author: max lipscomb

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy
customer_reviews.text: This doll is way to heavy , I regret getting my daughter this for xmas

customer_reviews.title: Expensive
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter at first she was a little scared of it, but now she loves it. It was expensive. Wouldn't recommend buying it for a 4 year old
customer_reviews.author: wendy lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Awkward but fun  doll
customer_reviews.text: This is one creepy doll that keeps my child entertained. Her pained hair is missing in a spot but no other issues. She is a little awkward for my 3 year daughter to hold but she finds a way.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Toy of the year! Bought this for my daughter for Christmas and she absolutely loves it. It is heavier as described, but my 6 year old carries her around with no problem. The facial expressions are amazing! I would highly recommend this to any little girl who loves baby dolls!!
customer_reviews.author: JessMGPR12

customer_reviews.title: Ugly but cute
customer_reviews.text: Ugly doll. She looks cute online, but when I got her, she was a little scary looking. Looks more like a monkey than a baby. My daughter loves it though.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure why everyone is so upset over the skin ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why everyone is so upset over the skin tone my daughter loves her wouldn’t be my first pick but my 4 year old adores her

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun.  So real!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 1/2 year old loves this doll. So real! Just disappointed in the shade of skin of brunette doll. It’s too close to the black skinned doll. I feel that she should be a little lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Luvabella doll is great.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter has loved playing with her and pretending to sleep when she is asleep , feeding her and talking to her !
customer_reviews.author: cceleste

customer_reviews.title: Never be disappointed with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Very lifelike. The quality is excellent. My seven-year-old granddaughter really enjoys and loves this doll. I thought you got a lot more than expected without paying out big bucks the price was very good.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn P

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Biggest waste of money I've ever spent. Doll does not work the way it's supposed to. Doesn't react to the accessories the way it is supposed to. I'd send it back if I still had the packaging

customer_reviews.title: Greatest doll I've ever seen
customer_reviews.text: Came in like 3 days when it said 2 weeks, quality, presentation it had it all. Top knotch doll. Was a huge hit for Christmas and still is played with after a year. Buy it is all I can say.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy ahead for Christmas!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this early for my Granddaughter for Christmas. She has had it only a week although I bought it in October before they were all gone. It is now malfunctioning and the return date stated it must be returned before Dec. 1st.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper Girl

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: I don't really write reviews but I just bought this doll 2-3 weeks ago and it worked just fine but now it won't open it's eyes and the head doesn't move anymore. My daughter barely had a chance to play with this doll. I don't recommend this doll to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Grand-daughter loves this doll. Okay, so the robotics can be heard a bit. No big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a month
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the high cost. Doll had issues upon taking it out of the box, but it was a Christmas gift which was an embarrassment
customer_reviews.author: A. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Need replacement
customer_reviews.text: Her arms dont move and her head keeps getting stuck. I will be replacing it
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: Always make sure you treat her like a real baby
customer_reviews.text: Luva Bella is so adorable. She’s the best baby doll for kids. My daughter absolutely loves her. When we got her for Christmas and we have never stopped playing with her since. She’s a bit pricey but definitely worth the money.

customer_reviews.title: This Doll Brings Joy!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves the doll. Thanks for being a reputable seller. ❤️❤️

customer_reviews.title: Kids love her
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun. Super cute. Her face cracks after talking awhile.

customer_reviews.title: The doll doesn't open eyes and mouth regularly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this doll for my niece by the end of 2017, she played it for just few times and then kept it in a wardrobe. Today she brings it out to play but the doll doesn't open eyes and mouth regularly. It keeps blinking and mouth opens & closes continuously. I don't know what happened? And where can I get help to fix that problem?

customer_reviews.title: Check doll color but works and feels realish

customer_reviews.title: Your kids will love this
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter.. She loves this thing.. Alway playing with it

My daughter is heartbroken and now we are going to go get her a baby alive doll because apparently they are better made.

customer_reviews.title: Unsure

customer_reviews.text: Guys, this is the real deal! My niece was afraid of her though so luckily we can return it! It’s worth it but a tad bit creepy! Adults get a huge laugh out of it!

customer_reviews.title: 3 year old gift

customer_reviews.title: Defective right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed with this Doll. We bought this for our 7 year old and it was her “big” Christmas gift. As soon as we turned it on there was a loud motorized clicking noise and the head remained turned to the right even though it tried to center itself. The eyes would not open and do not blink. It sounds like it is the motor that is continuously working to open and shut the eyes. This doll was such a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Cool but creepy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this doll.. despite the doll being a little heavy and the sounds of the ‘gears’ (for lack of better term), it’s actuallky pretty neat. My daughter brought it for show and share day and all the kids loved It in her day care class! Even the boys were obsessed with it.
customer_reviews.author: conrad paulson

customer_reviews.title: Loved the doll but her eyelash was off & sometimes ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved the doll but her eyelash was off & sometimes as she turns her head, it makes a clicking noise that sounds like a machine gun.

customer_reviews.title: Just a regular doll

customer_reviews.title: disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Great buy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the quality for how much this cost
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter for Christmas and when we put the batteries in it one of the screws won't screw in to hold the back on. I spent almost $150 for this and because I bought it at the end of October I can no longer exchange it even though we didn't open it until Christmas. Seller has never attempted to contacted me to make situation right. Would not purchase or recommend this doll or other items from this seller again. Bad quality items seem to be a pattern after reading some more recent reviews.

product_meta.title: Luvabella Brunette Hair Interactive Baby Doll with Expressions & Movement, Ages 4 & Up
product_meta.description: Discover so many real baby surprises with luvabella! from the moment she opens her eyes and giggles, luvabella will amaze you with her true-to-life facial expressions and personality! she moves, talks and plays just like a real baby. Through touch and play she affectionately responds to your love! cover her eyes for a game of peek-a-boo, tickle her tummy and toes to make her giggle, or place a hand on her chest to gently listen to her heartbeat. You can even hold her feet to hear her say “Mama” and begin to babble! the more you play with her, the more she’ll talk! her babble will transform into over 100 clear words and phrases! caring for luvabella is fun with her four interactive accessories! use her spoon to feed her and she’ll chew with delight! if she's not full, she may ask you for more! after her meal, help luvabella learn new animal names and sounds with her lamby toy! if she gets fussy, all she needs is her soother. When it's time to go to bed after a big day of play, lull her to sleep with her bottle. Get to know all of luvabella’s real baby surprises! bring love home today!
feature_bullets: ADORABLY INTERACTIVE: This adorable interactive doll will amaze you with her true to life facial expressions and movements! Play and interact with her in so many ways! For boys & girls age 4 & up
EXPANDING VOCABULARY: The more you play with Luvabella, the more she learns! As you talk and interact with her she’ll expand her vocabulary from baby babble to over 100 words and complete phrases!
REALISTIC & LIFELIKE: Luvabella will amaze you with true-to-life facial expressions & personality! She moves, talks & plays just like a real baby. Through touch & play she will respond to your love!
CUTE ACCESSORIES: Luvabella comes with interactive accessories including a spoon, bottle, pacifier and Lamby toy. Kids will enjoy a nurturing experience as they feed, burp, play & soothe their baby.

PERFECT WISH LIST GIFT: The Luvabella and Luvabeau dolls give children the chance to care and play with a lifelike baby doll their way. It's the perfect wish list gift for boys and girls age 4 and up!
